storage::types::Nullable< DataType > Class Template Reference

The Nullable class stores an optional value of any bindable type. Nullable objects can be used with ResultField::get, ResultField::set, and ResultRow::bind. More...

Detailed Description

template<typename DataType>
class storage::types::Nullable< DataType >

The Nullable class stores an optional value of any bindable type. Nullable objects can be used with ResultField::get, ResultField::set, and ResultRow::bind.

Member Function Documentation

◆ is_null()

template<typename DataType >

inline

Checks if object is null.

Returns
true if object is null false if object is not null
